description.zh-cn: 美籍华裔天体物理学家，1980年代中国“新启蒙运动”领袖之一，因六四事件流亡美国。
description.en: A Chinese-American astrophysicist, one of the leaders of the "New Enlightenment Movement" in China in the 1980s, who went into exile in the United States after the Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 方励之的妻子，曾在北京大学物理系任教。
description.en: Fang Lizhi's wife, formerly a professor in the Physics Department of Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期北京的名称。
description.en: The name for Beijing during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 美国亚利桑那州的一座城市。
description.en: A city in the state of Arizona, United States.

description.zh-cn: 1986年底由中国科学技术大学部分学生发起，后扩散至全国多地的学生运动。
description.en: A student movement initiated by students of the University of Science and Technology of China in late 1986, which later spread to other parts of the country.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京天安门广场的政治事件，以军队清场告终。
description.en: A political event that took place in Tiananmen Square, Beijing, China in 1989, ending with a military crackdown.

description.zh-cn: 1957年在中国发起的一场政治运动，旨在打击被认为是“右派”的知识分子和官员。
description.en: A political campaign launched in China in 1957 to purge alleged "Rightists" among intellectuals and officials.

en: University of Science and Technology of China

description.zh-cn: 位于中国安徽省合肥市的一所研究型大学。
description.en: A research university located in Hefei, Anhui, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导集体的核心人物。
description.en: The paramount leader of the People's Republic of China from December 1978 to November 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国作家、记者、异议人士。
description.en: A Chinese writer, journalist, and dissident.

en: Embassy of the United States, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 美国在中国设立的外交代表机构。
description.en: The diplomatic mission of the United States in China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名大学。
description.en: A major research university in Beijing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院下属的物理学研究机构。
description.en: A physics research institute under the Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学家，曾任中国科学技术大学校长。
description.en: A Chinese physicist who served as the president of the University of Science and Technology of China.

description.zh-cn: 旅美中国作家、政治评论家。
description.en: A US-based Chinese author and political commentator.

description.zh-cn: 中国物理学史家、思想家、社会活动家。
description.en: A Chinese historian of physics, thinker, and social activist.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者、作家、异议人士。
description.en: A Chinese journalist, writer, and dissident.

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院国家天文台的前身之一。
description.en: A predecessor of the National Astronomical Observatories, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 1987年在中国发起的一场政治运动，旨在反对被认为受西方影响的“资产阶级自由化”思想。
description.en: A political campaign launched in China in 1987 to oppose 'bourgeois liberalization,' which was considered to be influenced by Western ideas.

description.zh-cn: 中国民运人士。
description.en: A Chinese human rights activist and dissident.

description.zh-cn: 八九民运中的学生领袖之一。
description.en: One of the student leaders in the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests.

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民政府下属主管公共安全工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Beijing Municipal People's Government responsible for public security.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国亚利桑那州图森市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university in Tucson, Arizona, United States.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代在中国兴起的思想解放运动，旨在反思历史、推动政治和文化现代化。
description.en: An intellectual movement in China during the 1980s that aimed to reflect on history and promote political and cultural modernization.

description.zh-cn: 北美洲的联邦共和国。
description.en: A federal republic in North America.

description.zh-cn: 方励之的次子。
description.en: Fang Lizhi's second son.

description.zh-cn: 方励之的长子。
description.en: Fang Lizhi's eldest son.

description.zh-cn: 方励之于1955年入党，1957年反右运动中被第一次开除党籍，十一届三中全会后恢复党籍，1987年因八六学潮被第二次开除党籍。
description.en: Fang Lizhi joined the party in 1955, was expelled for the first time during the 1957 Anti-Rightist Campaign, had his membership restored after the 3rd Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee, and was expelled for the second time in 1987 due to the 1986 student protests.

description.zh-cn: 在反右运动中被打成“内定右派”，并被第一次开除党籍。
description.en: During the Anti-Rightist Campaign, he was labeled an "internally designated rightist" and expelled from the Communist Party for the first time.

position.zh-cn: 助教、讲师、教授、第一副校长
position.en: Teaching Assistant, Lecturer, Professor, First Vice President

description.zh-cn: 方励之在中国科学技术大学担任第一副校长期间，管惟炎是校长。
description.en: When Fang Lizhi served as the First Vice President of the University of Science and Technology of China, Guan Weiyan was the President.

description.zh-cn: 以上海同济大学研究生会名义，编辑并传播《方励之姚蜀平演讲集》，使方励之的观点在全国高校迅速传播。
description.en: Under the name of the Tongji University Graduate Student Union, he edited and disseminated the "Collection of Speeches by Fang Lizhi and Yao Shuping," rapidly spreading Fang's views across universities nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 共同发起召开《反右运动三十年历史学术讨论会》。
description.en: Jointly initiated the 'Academic Symposium on the Thirtieth Anniversary of the Anti-Rightist Movement'.

description.zh-cn: 共同发起召开《反右运动三十年历史学术讨论会》。
description.en: Jointly initiated the 'Academic Symposium on the Thirtieth Anniversary of the Anti-Rightist Movement'.

description.zh-cn: 在学生集会上发表演讲“民主不是自上而下给予的，而是从下到上争取的”，对学潮产生影响。
description.en: Delivered a speech at a student rally stating, "Democracy is not granted from above, but won from below," which influenced the student protests.

description.zh-cn: 在就八六学潮问题与中央负责同志的谈话中，点名要求开除方励之、刘宾雁、王若望的党籍。
description.en: In a talk with central leaders regarding the 1986 student protests, he specifically named Fang Lizhi, Liu Binyan, and Wang Ruowang for expulsion from the party.

description.zh-cn: 在该运动中，方励之的言论受到各报刊重点批判。
description.en: During this campaign, Fang Lizhi's speeches were heavily criticized by various newspapers and publications.

description.zh-cn: 向邓小平发表公开信，建议释放民运人士魏京生等。
description.en: Published an open letter to Deng Xiaoping, suggesting the release of dissident Wei Jingsheng and others.

description.zh-cn: 王丹等人将方励之撰写的《中国的希望和失望》以大字报形式在北大张贴。
description.en: Wang Dan and others posted Fang Lizhi's article 'China's Disappointment and Hope' as a big-character poster at Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 因在六四事件中支持学生诉求，事件后被迫进入美国驻华大使馆寻求庇护，并被通缉，最终流亡美国。
description.en: Due to his support for student demands during the Tiananmen Square protests, he was forced to seek refuge in the U.S. Embassy after the incident, was placed on a wanted list, and ultimately went into exile in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 向方励之夫妇提供庇护长达一年。
description.en: Provided asylum to Fang Lizhi and his wife for a year.

description.zh-cn: 因反革命宣传煽动罪通缉方励之。
description.en: Issued a warrant for the arrest of Fang Lizhi on charges of counter-revolutionary propaganda and incitement.

description.zh-cn: 允许方励之入境并最终归化为美国公民，为其提供了流亡后的居所和工作机会。
description.en: Allowed Fang Lizhi to enter the country and eventually become a naturalized U.S. citizen, providing him with a place of residence and work opportunities after his exile.
